mg.mapviewer.util

Class Geoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • mg.mapviewer.util.Geoid

  • public class Geoid
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides for a given point (latitude, longitude) a difference between wgs84 altitude and nmea altitude. For performance issues the results are cached.
